name: Surreal World
description:
The only thing that remains are stories.

Even when everything comes to an end when even the memories of the old world are lost. Even then, there will still be stories worth telling.

Surreal World is a genre-independent game experience where the player not only chooses his own story but tells it himself. Or builds it in the easily accessible editor. The difficulty and content of the experience can be customized by the player to suit their skills and preferences, and as stories become more complex, more building blocks are unlocked to customize them just for your story.
